title.rendered: Melbourne vs Brisbane, Australian T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Melbourne: Joe Clarke (wk), Thomas Rogers, Hilton Cartwright, Beau Webster, Nick Larkin, James Seymour, Clint Hinchliffe, Luke Wood, Brody Couch/Nathan Coulter-Nile, Liam Hatcher, Adam Zampa (c)

Brisbane: Usman Khawaja (c), Josh Brown, Marnus Labuschagne, Matt Renshaw, Sam Hain, Jimmy Peirson (wk), James Bazley, Michael Neser, Spencer Johnson, Mitchell Swepson, Matthew Kuhnemann

Venue: MCG, Melbourne

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games.)

First innings average score: 141

Second innings average score: 146

Weather: Clear

Wickets per innings: 6

Wins

Batting first: 33%

Batting second: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Usman Khawaja has stellar numbers at the MCG. In 11 innings, he has accumulated 483 runs at 48, including the highest score of 109*.

Adam Zampa has taken 47 wickets in 26 games, including the best figures of 5 for 17 at the MCG.

Although Melbourne S lost to Melbourne R in their last game, Joe Clarke was the captain of the Ultimate Team for scoring 59 off 37. Moreover, he also registered his maiden century at the MCG a few weeks ago.

For Brisbane, James Bazley was the captain of the Ultimate Team for bagging a three-for in the game against Adelaide.

In the last 3 matches at the MCG, 71% of the wickets have belonged to the seamers.

Given the bigger square boundaries, only 16 sixes have been hit at the venue in the last 3 games.

7 top-order batters have been dismissed for a single-digit score in the last 3 games at the MCG.
